eventName: Adventure That Cannot Wait for the Sun
storyInfo: Zubayr brings Pepe to the trove and explains his reasons for guarding it. Though Pepe understands, she must fight him to protect the city. Meanwhile, Narantuya and Aspasia argue over who should undertake the most dangerous part of the plan.

attributes.content: Welcome, Pepe.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Is this the Shah's treasure trove? It looks so much like the museum...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Your instincts are correct. Parts of the city felt familiar, even before my memories returned.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I believe its architects may have been inspired by the mausoleum.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: What lies here, Zubayr?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: The oil lamps on the wall light up, illuminating the hall with rays that meander through the mirror-smooth walls and pillars.
Countless ghostly shadows appear in an orderly procession in the hall.
So the treasure in the Shah's trove was... himself?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Was he a narcissist?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Of course not. My sister missed Father after he was gone, and she had me preserve his visage here.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: A thousand years ago, historians preserved the words and deeds of my father using ancient technology they discovered, allowing him to appear, in a way.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I found something similar in Arsalan. It showed me an image of the Shah in a crystal cave.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I left it as such. I thought a descendant of Nightzmora would find it and follow the trail.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You hid it too well, Zubayr. No one else could have found it.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I hid it? I built a massive temple on top of it.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I guess it didn't stand the test of time. All I found were some ruins.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: But it guided you here, where you awakened me.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: That is the wonder of time. What seemed trivial at the time could, by fate and coincidence, cause the puzzle piece to fall perfectly into place.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: There are even images of the Shah without his mask...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Arsalan wasn't the only site I've seen images like these. When I was little, while playing hide-and-seek, my brother and I stumbled upon a chamber where the dead lay in their sarcophagi.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I knew I would have to come into contact with these things eventually, but it was too much for a child of my age.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: In my panic, I accidentally activated a mechanism and an image of the Shah appeared. At the time, I didn't know who he was—just some ghost trying to communicate with me.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: He told me those sarcophagi were history buried in the sand.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: When those from the future dig them up, they will serve as a bridge across the vastness of time, bringing history and the present together over the great river of time.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I remember the saying... it's what Father said to comfort my sister when our mother passed away.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I remember what he said to my sister, after she became Historian. You must not...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You must not let escape what made those heroes heroes so—each history has its reverse face.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: So you've heard it.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: It was the last thing the image said. I've never forgotten.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Looking upon the image of Lugalszargus, Pepe cannot help but feel a sense of absurdity.
She had spent so much time wondering what the Shah's treasure trove held.
Now, though, she realizes she has been chasing shadow after shadow.
She holds her hammer tight, fighting back the urge to swing it and drive away the visages.
But what she fears more is the notion that perhaps her family's duty and legacy are nothing more than shadows too.
Medjehtiqedti Hanim, I've contacted all your staff in the directory.
attributes.name: Ajani

attributes.content: Anyone else crazy enough to come?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I'm not sure. A lot of the answers are very vague...
attributes.name: Ajani

attributes.content: Thank you. Get a few more bottles of water for Anat, please.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: At once, Medjehtiqedti Hanim.
attributes.name: Ajani

attributes.content: Brave souls like Izaja and Inaja are hard to come by.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: We only have a couple of hours, Anat.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: The best thing we could ask of them is to make a run for it outside the city.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Sorry, Titi, but I'm busy comparing the city survey records and I don't have time to think about that.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: But you know why I stayed. The same reason as you.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: ...Duty.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: What about the two tourists, though? They have nothing to do with Zubayr's reanimation.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: They don't even have much to do with the city. But now we're asking them to go into the sewers, do the most dangerous investigation, and try to block the sand from surging in.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Which is why I must do my best, so that their courage isn't wasted.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: ...I'll rub your ears.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Thank you, Titi. I needed that.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Look, this construction logbook mentions unusual geological structures.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I'll mark them down.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Say, Titi... I never managed to publish my research on Zubayr, and no one will ever know about our explorations of the subterranean structure of the city...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Will Father be disappointed that I died without leaving my 'name' behind?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Blame Pepe. Our dear Princess was just too good at her job—
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: —Lazvar Effendi?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I apologize, esteemed Overseer, but the museum is not in a position to offer hospitality during this emergency...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Please, no need for formalities. I'm no longer the Overseer; just a humble craftsman, free again at last.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: The museum cannot guarantee your safety at this time. We must advise you to leave the city center as soon as possible, by any means possible...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: After I handed everything over, I stood before the flowing sands with Zubayr Effendi for a while.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: You saw him?!
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: I saw him attempt to repair one clay statue after another using Arts, but eventually he stopped and said to me, 'Such is our duty.'
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I understand. Duty is what we uphold to the very end, without ever asking why.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: To whatever end.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: What can I do to save the city?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Alright, it's time to show my leadership skills. Soon you'll realize that you should've listened to me and stayed in the museum to protect the others—
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: We'll end up where we started if we turn left here.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: ...What the heck is going on? This hasn't happened before, in all my time in these sewers.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Let me just say that I've never gotten lost when leading my crew. This isn't an indicator of my incompetence.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I didn't say it was. Perhaps these winding passages were designed to confuse your sense of direction.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I overheard part of the conversation as the museum curators were perusing the survey records.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: They believe these old sewers are just a small part of the city's underground structures, and they might be able to deduce a path to the deeper levels through historical records.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: They had been assisting an archaeologist, trying to find clues that may lead to the site known as the 'treasure trove' in ancient documents.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: If the former site of another massive building really is hidden beneath this city...
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: A treasure trove?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ...Forget I said anything.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: You don't seem afraid.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Afraid of what?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Isn't our job just to find the sand leak and close the gate to that section? If the gate's broken, we'll just seal it with the boards that we're carrying.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: There is a good chance we won't find it.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Well... that would be a shame, since the city is getting buried in the sand, if we fail.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: But we'll be the first to see the sand rushing up from deep down, and we may have time to call the museum and warn them to run. We'll be dead for sure, of course.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Wait... is this why you insisted on coming to the sewers?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Because it's dangerous, and you need to be at the front of it?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Narantuya, Aspasia, do you hear me?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Yeah, we're together.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: We found a clue.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Listen carefully and you should find Lazvar's clockwork fowlbeasts... They're machines that resemble blue fowlbeasts.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: We've estimated a few possible locations for the deep-level structures. If you can create an opening in the wall, the clockwork fowlbeasts can fly down and gather information.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: With enough information, we should be able to find exactly where the sand is rushing in. But there is one caveat...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: The clockwork fowlbeasts are unable to perform heavier tasks like toggling switches and plugging gaps... you will have to go into danger.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: You must have seen it in the memories that I showed you. The circlet you're wearing is the same as my sister's.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: It was passed down through the family.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I wondered why my family was so obsessed with recording the Shahanshah's history. Father had no answer; he simply said it was our inherent duty.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: But now I see the answer is so simple: it is out of a daughter's longing for her father.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: My sister always believed that he would return, someday.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: She never saw that day. And I never got the chance to say goodbye to her.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: All I had left for company after my sister's death was my father's shadows.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Leave your obsession with the City of Gold behind, Pepe. I know how to seal consciousness into a gem, and how to build a body that never decays.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You will have life eternal to experience, to discover, to record...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Zubayr... I can't replace your sister and keep you company.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I have a younger brother myself. He's the Historian of Shar-Agade.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: A shame. It is hardly an honor. They know too much that cannot be put to paper.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: My foolish brother wanted the historians to document history to his liking, and so he forced my sister to send one of her twin sons into the palace.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: A thousand years later, coercion has become honor.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: The Sovereign of Beasts said all historians will have their tongues cut out. Is that true?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I do not know the ways of the current Shahanshah, but it is a proven way to keep a secret.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I need to go to the City of Gold and find him, no matter what.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I knew it.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Then leave, Pepe.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: No... Not yet.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I can't leave this city to its fate.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I can't allow the constructs to continue wreaking havoc in the city.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Spare the city. As you said, the most precious treasures have not been defiled.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I cannot stop, Pepe, even if I wanted to.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: In our lives, we go through many choices, big and small. One links to another, carving out unique circuits for all of us amidst infinite branching paths.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: My oaths to Father and Sister have been etched as circuits, preserved for all eternity upon these gems.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I can never defy them.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Never.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Then tell me how to stop the constructs, Zubayr.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I have already told you the answer. The rest is up to you, Pepe.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Catch me if you can, like the invading armies so many centuries ago.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: There's something I've been meaning to tell you, since talking to Ajazi and Ajani the other day.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Man, this is a hard rock. I hope we have enough time... what did they say?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: A blue clockwork fowlbeast circles overhead, urging them to dig through the stone bricks before them.
Aspasia is glad that everything is going smoothly. She has only one more task before embarking on the path, if it indeed exists.
I learned why you thirst for wealth. You feel like you owe your past crew.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Oh. When did they start? The night when we fled for our lives? Or the time when I gave away all the treasure?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: After you left.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I heard many stories from Ajazi and Ajani—how they struggled to use saws properly while logging, often breaking them with brute force. How they tried their hand at bookkeeping but messed up the records.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: How someone slaughtered their last burdenbeast with a knife, then sold the knife to buy a pot to treat everyone to a feast.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: ...Word about his cooking spread, and he opened a food stall at the market. Customers flock to his stall till this very day.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: How someone wrote a novel based on their time as a desert bandit and became published in the local paper. The latest chapters feature your gang traveling back in time to fight for the Shah's throne.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Most of your old crew have a house and don't need to migrate with the seasons. If they fix their roofs in time, they won't even leak during monsoon season. I'd say they're all doing rather well.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: ...Of course I know that.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I respect you, but I don't think you owe them anything.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Just as you don't have to save an entire city just to save Ajazi and Ajani.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: You should get out, go back to see them... then put down your burden, your 'duty', and start moving forward again.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Aspasia is interrupted by the rumbling of a sliding boulder.
The pair seems to have stumbled upon one of the mechanisms of the ancient maze; the etched brick retreats into the walls of the canal, and they hear the sound of falling a few seconds later.
The entire wall begins to collapse, but as Anat said, what lies beyond is not sand.
Pitch-black darkness indicates that they are staring at the interior of a massive structure.
There is no path in front of them. The sound of quicksand is clearly audible from deeper in, as though there is a raging river deep in the abyss.
A river from which there is no return.
The pair throw down their pickaxes and draw their weapons at exactly the same time.
Kicking up a cloud of dust, they face off less than ten paces apart.
What are you doing?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Stopping you from jumping down.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Wasn't I the one who had to stop you just now?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Been wanting to say this, if you came to die, I can't let you go any further.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I thought you would be better than those two stooges, but it turns out you need me to save you, too.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: ...I told you, you don't have to carry this burden.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: You've got it wrong. I just want to go down and see for myself. Besides, no one can do it better than me. That's all.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I want a mountain of gold, even if I didn't care about letting my crew live a better life. I'm just greedy, plain and simple.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: 'In our lives, we go through many choices, big and small.'
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: You call it duty. I prefer to call it my choice. This is who I am.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Right then. You're a trained fighter who won't walk into a knife. Well, things are about to get real this time. Don't get mad.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I have nothing but sincere gratitude towards you, Narantuya.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I need not fear a duel with you.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I didn't dare believe my heart, because I had made an oath to my family... about blood and violence, about war being the most just form of violation.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: But you've shown me how resolved the heart can be.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Perhaps there is something to be said about the convictions of the Sargonians. My choices make me who I am. From this day—
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: —Hey, wait for me to finish!
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Her vision goes black.
A black blade fan sweeps past her eyes. She blinks just once, but the only light source has already gone out.
She knows that Narantuya has two black knives. They are equipped with special mechanisms and cannot be unsheathed directly.
Yet in that instant, all she recalls is the Kuranta Elders known as the Nightzmora—renowned for their relentless marching day and night, devouring the sun at high noon.
She charges at where her counterpart should be, relying on her memory—
—And comes up empty.
A little sleight of sand, a simple mirage of Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Who said anything about winning the fight? All I need to do is jump first.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Embraced by darkness and illusion, Narantuya takes a step back.
Wait, Narantuya! This is not a fair duel!
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Another silver medal for you.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Are you serious, Zubayr?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: You're instructing me to attack you, and moving like the wind at the same time.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Give up, Pepe. I told you, it's futile.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You can never touch me, no matter how hard you swing that hammer of yours.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Hmph, I'll show you!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Are you trying to break the support beams to limit my movements?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Again, it's futile.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: The broken columns and floor are quickly repaired by sand, leaving no trace of damage.
Pepe goes through illusion after illusion, seeking Zubayr.
Whenever she catches a glimpse, however, he soon disappears behind more illusions and is once again nowhere to be seen.
Focus, Pepe.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Did you know, Zubayr?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Before I turned fourteen, the doctors said I was a frail girl who would never lift a heavy hammer like this.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Quite the difference, the way you're swinging it, despite your diminutive figure.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I trained under Sargon's top strongman so that I could penetrate the deserts and jungles, and discover long-lost ancient ruins.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: By the age of seventeen, I could cross the vast desert on my own, and fight off a dozen bandits at the same time.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: That alone is not enough, Pepe.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I'm not trying to prove myself to you.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I'm just telling you, there has never been anything I couldn't do, if I put my mind to it.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: No matter how hard, how out of reach... as long as I mean it...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I can do it!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: You hold this impression because you have only lived twenty-two years.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I had cut down countless foes with my sword when I fought under my father's banner.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Their screams filled me with confidence. I believed that there was nothing I couldn't acquire, nothing I couldn't do, given enough time.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Little did I know, that my greatest enemy... was time itself!
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: A golden flash, and Pepe feels an intense pain from her ankle before she could turn around.
The staff is much heavier than expected.
You must be faster, Pepe.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: It is etched upon my gem circuit that everyone who violates my father's tomb must die.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Your attacks have begun to anger it.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: It is urging me to put an end to it all.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: You should not have played this game with me, Zubayr.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: This is not a game, Pepe.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: No, it is...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: You closed your eyes?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Nothing but darkness. Pepe knows that her eyes aren't fast enough and will only hold her back.
She could never catch her agile brother when playing hide-and-seek in the garden. He was like a slippery fin.
Until one day, she closed her eyes, and realized she could hear every footstep her brother made on the stone tiles.

attributes.text: 'I'm ready, sis! Come look for me!'

attributes.content: He's right behind me...
If I turn around quick enough...

attributes.text: 'Why did you close your eyes? Are you admitting defeat?'

attributes.content: I can catch him.
Mustering all her might, Pepe turns and swings her hammer. Sure enough, she hears the sound of shattering.
